question: A nucleus with mass number 220 initially at rest emits an alpha particle. If the Q value of reaction is 5.5 MeV, calculate the value of kinetic energy of alpha particle.
explanation: Kinetic energy of alpha particle <katex>$K_\alpha = \frac{A - 4}{A} Q$</katex>. <katex>$K_\alpha = \frac{220 - 4}{220} \times 5.5 = \frac{216}{220} \times 5.5 = 5.4$</katex> MeV.
